tem. | |status|**Operational Delay:** `schedops.LEG_DELAY`| |**Operational Delay:** `STATE`|**Operational Delay:** when `schedops.LEG_DELAY.STATE` = “NEW“ then “ACTIVE“ else “CANCELLED“
**Scheduled Delay:** Sets to “ACTIVE”| # Flight Crew Need Vector Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * `xcrew.item_daily.Time_stamp` > Last Data Retrieval Date #### - Source Query * `Riverx_FlightCrewNeedVector_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps * Every 1 minutes #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key combining `legId`, `dutyType` and `position` fields * Delete operation can not be performed because of the lack of status in the source system data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |flightId| | |N/A in the source system.| |dutyType| | |
  • when `xcrew.item_daily.type` = “F“ then “DH“ 
  • when `xcrew.item_daily.type` = “L“ then “AC”
| |legId|`xcrew.item_daily`|`external_id`| | |numberOfCrew|`xcrew.chain_daily`|`original_no_fd_0`,
`original_no_fd_1`,
`original_no_ca_0`,
`original_no_ca_1`,
`original_no_ca_3`|
  • when `position` = “CP” then `original_no_fd_0`
  • when `position` = “FO“ then `original_no_fd_1`
  • when `position` = “PU“ then `original_no_ca_0`
  • when `position` = “SE“ then `original_no_ca_1`
  • when `position` = “JU“ then `original_no_ca_3`
| |position| | |The field is set to one of the following values in the query.
  • “CP”
  • “FO”
  • “PU”
  • “SE”
  • “JU”
|
